DOC.brief_summary: Since Spiriva Inhalation Capsules 18mcg ( hereinafter product ) indicate treatment patient chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( i.e . patient chronic bronchitis pulmonary emphysema ) usually intend long-term use , present survey conduct collect safety effectiveness information use product long period time daily clinical setting , obtain proper drug use information .
